thread.title: Man Leads The Crowd In A Stirring Version Of The Sea Shanty ‘Roll The Old Chariot’

author: Reshareworthy Editorial Team
title: Man Leads The Crowd In A Stirring Version Of The Sea Shanty ‘Roll The Old Chariot’
text:
Man Leads The Crowd In A Stirring Version Of The Sea Shanty ‘Roll The Old Chariot’ Subscribe to Reshareworthy! It's FREE and always will be! 
Singer David Coffin sure knows how to belt out a maritime tune and at the Portsmouth Maritime Folk Festival in 2010 he lead the crowd in a rousing version of ‘Roll the Old Chariot’ 
Share this entertaining “Sea Shanty” with your family and friends. Subscribe to Reshareworthy! It's FREE and always will be! Like Us On Facebook!
